# Component Registry Template

**Status:** [Active/Draft]
**Last Updated:** [Date]
**Maintained By:** Gemini (Archivist)

> "A place for everything, and everything in its place."

This registry tracks the purpose, dependencies, and state of all React components in the project.

| Component | Path                        | Purpose                                      |
| --------- | --------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- |
| `App.jsx` | `src/App.jsx`               | Root application, routing, provider wrapping |
| `Header`  | `src/components/Header.jsx` | Top navigation                               |

| Component | Path                        | Purpose       |
| --------- | --------------------------- | ------------- |
| `[Name]`  | `src/components/[Name].jsx` | [Description] |

| Component     | Path                             | Purpose   |
| ------------- | -------------------------------- | --------- |
| `[Name]Modal` | `src/components/[Name]Modal.jsx` | [Purpose] |
